name: Teleport
effect:
:activation: During Combat, move one allied \* [unit](../units/index.md) to any empty space - ignore any obstacles or effects when moving.

:empower: 0 ➣ \*:bronze:
:empower: 1 ➣ \*:bronze: or :silver:
:empower: 2 ➣ \*:bronze: or :silver: or :golden:

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
